user.mail_exists: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM user WHERE Mail = ?) THEN CAST (1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST (0 AS BIT) END
user.user_name_exists: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM user WHERE User_Name = ?) THEN CAST (1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST (0 AS BIT) END
user.create_user: INSERT INTO user(User_ID, User_Name, Password_Hash, Mail, Firstname, Lastname) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
